tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GenomicData (
  sample_id UUID,
  patient_id UUID,
  gene_id UUID,
  mutation_type VARCHAR,
  mutation_details TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY (sample_id)
)

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE genetic_data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  dna_sequence VARCHAR(1000),
  gene_variant VARCHAR(50),
  mutation_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE research_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  result_description TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_patient FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_data(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dob DATE,
  gender CHAR(1),
  blood_group VARCHAR(3)
)

CREATE TABLE samples (
  sample_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  sample_type VARCHAR(50),
  collection_date DATE,
  lab_technician VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE tests (
  test_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT REFERENCES samples(sample_id),
  test_type VARCHAR(50),
  test_result TEXT,
  test_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE genetic_variants (
  variant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  test_id INT REFERENCES tests(test_id),
  gene_name VARCHAR(50),
  variant_type VARCHAR(50),
  impact_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  genetic_info JSON
)

CREATE TABLE samples (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  sample_type VARCHAR(50),
  sample_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE genes (
  gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  chromosome VARCHAR(5),
  gene_sequence TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE variations (
  variation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_id INT,
  variant_type VARCHAR(50),
  frequency FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE studies (
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
  study_date DATE
)
